title: Anthony Davis, Patriots, Rams, and LeBron James
itunes:title: Anthony Davis, Patriots, Rams, and LeBron James
description:
Colin discusses why New Orleans Pelicans F Anthony Davis is right to want a trade, why the New England Patriots should be getting more credit, what could hurt the Los Angeles Rams during the Super Bowl, and more on the friction between the Los Angeles Lakers and F LeBron James. Guests include Greg Jennings, Peter King, Matt Barnes, and Bill Romanowski.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
